Html:
Hi,

I'm using Prism for 2 years now, and I appreciate a lot your works.

But now, a lot of frameworks are compatible also with WP7 - nRoute, MVVM Light, ... -, and I think it's a must be for your next version.

Are you planning a WP7 compatible version for Prism 4 Marcos

Hi Marcos,

The definite feature set for Prism 4 isn’t decided yet. You can read more about it on this and this blog posts. Regarding the support for WP7, they mention: “We intend to support Windows Phone development in a future release of Prism. In the meantime we’ll be tracking the Windows Phone 7 Series development platform closely.”

Currently p&p is also conducting this survey you can take and indicate that you consider it to be an important feature to include in the next version.

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
